colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 694

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project, which would
            increase the water production of the Commission by about
            12.5 million gallons a day, will derive water from two
            underground sources (i) Tulloch Spring, about 20 miles from
            Kingston, and (ii) wells in the Spanish Town area, about 12
            miles from Kingston. The project would consist of the
            construction of the intake, pumping and chlorination works
            at the sources, pumping mains, reservoirs, distribution
            mains and other incidental works.
